txt.en: 'Another victory. Let us return to Andrath and tell them the good news.'

Once a bastion of the Kingdom of Cardolan, the ruins of Caranost now teem with vile Orcs. Here in the courtyard at the foot of the grand steps, the savage Orcs established a small outpost to thwart would-be heroes from rooting them out of the ruins. You are here to see that this foothold does not last.
Clear the Orcs out of the courtyard at Caranost ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
